name: Bubbles Vs Balloons
description:
You play as a bubble. - who, for some reason has the longing to go to space.  However, there is a problem, it's the day of a celebration so the sky is filled with deadly balloons that can pop you at any time!  

Luckily you have the ability to split yourself - to capture or destroy the balloons. 

Can you make it to space while avoiding all of the balloons? And what are those golden bubbles...

Made in 72 hours for the MiniJam84. 

(Created by Laptopcoder11, Sadd Memon and someone)
